title: Printing Refund Policy: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: The library provides no cash refunds for printing.Â The library will, however, issue reprints under the following circumstances: The following circumstances do not merit a reprint: Request Refunds Online You can request that funds be added back to your NUPrint account through the NUPrint website under the Recent Print Jobs page. A refund can only be given in the form of NUPrint account funds. Northwestern University Library does not give cash refunds for reprints or unused balances. Last Review: April 2021
